orig_text:
Operators should assign the same IPv4
   address (e.g., 192.0.0.2/32 [RFC6333]) to all AFTRs.
correct_text:
Operators should assign the same IPv4 
   address (e.g., 192.0.0.1/32 [RFC6333]) to all AFTRs.
notes:
In RFC6333 6.5:

    The AFTR SHOULD use the well-known IPv4 address 192.0.0.1 reserved by
    IANA to configure the IPv4-in-IPv6 tunnel.

In RFC6333 5.7:

    ..., and 192.0.0.2 is reserved for the B4 element.

I think this is Editorial because the IP address here is just an example.
